content:
sequenceDiagram
    participant "Phone Swap Request Feature"
    participant "Backend (Logic)"
    participant "Frontend (UI/UX)"
    note "Request Phone Swap" as "Start"
    Phone Swap Request Feature->>Backend (Logic): Request phone swap
    alt Successful submission
    note "Modal closed, confirmation message displayed" as "Success"
    Backend (Logic)->>Frontend (UI/UX): Confirmation message
    else Failure
    note "Error handling" as "Failure"
    Phone Swap Request Feature->>Backend (Logic): Error handling
    end
    note "Cancel button clicked" as "Cancel"
    Phone Swap Request Feature->>Frontend (UI/UX): Cancel request
    note "Modal closed, no confirmation message displayed" as "Cancel"
    note "Request phone swap feature implemented" as "End"

erDiagram

  PhoneSwapRequest ||--o{ Status : status
